about_the_game:
Shadows of Kepler is a Sci-Fi Horror Survival game with RPG elements which brings an unique style in first person.

In our game you will have "butterfly effects". That means, choices matter, a simple yes or no in a conversation will change the whole fate of a character and even your path. Sometimes choices will be unconscious. Small decisions, great twists.

After a huge catastrophe on Earth, Sergeant Cooper wakes up on the spaceship, Everything looks fine until all hell breaks lose during the entrance of the planet Kepler.



Kepler is full of dangerous places and foes. The player will have to discover how to survive in this unique environment and in and out of the ship.

Everything is connected with charismatic characters who helps you to survive in this place.

Uncover the mysteries of this very hazardous adventure, welcome to Shadows of Kepler.

Features

  • A beautiful, hostile world - discover the dangers of the planet Kepler
  • Deadly combat and stealth - customize your arsenal of weaponry, engage human and mutant foes in a thrilling tactical combat
  • Your choices determine how you will survive in the journey; your decisions have consequence in the storyline that offers massive re-playability
  • The different place areas let's you see a little of everything in this journey, using your space suit, try to help humans and survive in this terrifying place

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Just Updated



Hello. My name is Rodrigo and I am the developer of Shadows of Kepler. You may not know it, but the production of Shadows of Kepler is stopped. It's stopped until I have the money to bring back a good team to finish the game. The programmer of Shadows of Kepler used the C ++ language. Due to my limitations in that part, I was unable to continue the production. On the other hand I started a new game in January 2020, this time a solo project called Parallel, the production is going very well and you can check out some gameplays and trailers on YouTube, I also did a Steam page. With your support in this new game, after the launch I believe I can bring Shadow of Kepler's team back. The guys are amazing and I was really sad that I didn't have the money to keep them working. They all have other responsibilities and roles, but for me game development is my main goal in my life. For me there is no happiness if I am not thinking of doing something nice to make people have fun. I hope you understand my point. if you want to help me and help Shadows of Kepler, I ask that you follow the Parallel videos on YouTube and add the game to your Steam wish list. I'll put the links here. Do not lose faith on Shadows of Kepler, because I will work with game development for the rest of my life and Shadows of Kepler has great potential to be a good game. I just need to have the right conditions and make it happen. Thanks



Website:






Hello guys, let's take a look to the latest news. Patch 1.0 is out. Thanks for all the support. As you may know, we are a very, very small team with Zero resources, but we're focused on hear your feedback which will help us a lot on the improvements for our game.

1 - When players get stuck behind the stairs (fixed)
2 - The fake death with the octopus corrupting your progress (fixed)
3 - Corrupt broken glass with the mutant (fixed)
4 - Improved the laser mode explosion of the enemies (its more flashy)
5 - You don't lose your items anymore on the card room
6 - You now can kill the radiation mutated with the right ammo and amount of shoots, and you don't stay stuck with a black screen when you die
7 - Fixed some texts and sounds
8 - The mutated on the embryo room don't hide anymore
9 - An invisible collision was corrected on the embryo room
10 - The collision on the left in the embryo room now is fixed

We will keep working on the bugs and improvements. Thanks for playing the game and have fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770k or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / GeForce RTX 2060 / AMD RX VEGA 56
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Shadows of Kepler is a Sci-Fi Horror Survival game with RPG elements which brings an unique style in first person. Walking on the shoes of Seargent Cooper and help him make the right choices in this terrifying journey. Don't let the planet Kepler tame you, keep the human hope alive.
